page.title: 20PRIMARY EDUCATION.
page.content:
In the Carlton/Netherfield area,there are seven primary schools.They are Carlton Central Infants,Carlton Cenral Junior,Parkdale J.M.I.,Netherfield Infants,Netherfield Junior,Colwick St. Johns Church of England J.M.I.,Carlton St.Augustine's Roman Catholic J.M.I.
Among them these schools cater for a total of 1,440 pupils between the age of 5 and 11.A tipical school is St. Augustine's RC J.M.I.This school has 162 children and 7 teachers split into two infant classes and four junior classes.
